actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a 5-year recovery period for grapevines replanted as a result of a phylloxera infestation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a five-year recovery period for purposes of the depreciation deduction for any grapevine replanted in a vineyard after December 31, 1992, as a direct result of a phylloxera infestation in such vineyard. Allows a ten-year recovery period for such replanted grapevines under the alternative depreciation system.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a 5-year recovery period for grapevines replanted as a result of a phylloxera infestation.
